body:
Hello Avicus Community!
My name is Will / Seeking. Almost 2 years ago, I joined and started playing Nebula. After an year I started playing mainly Hypixel, but would poke my head occasionally into this server. I started playing this server again a lot these last few days and found it improved so much. This post is kind of like saying that I would be spending a lot of time on this server ( TS, Forums, and In-Game). (Also applying for Mod)

And for that AMA, ask me anything, I am going to answer anything honestly. Thanks!

Survival or Creative? Don't do Single player, but if I have to chose, Creative.

Cake? Chocolate Ice Cream Cake

replies.body:
Fav Food: Abondigas Locas (A soup)
Worst thing about Avicus: The knockback
Best think about Avicus: The MapDev team's maps.
My Age? Confidential. (But Old Enough)
